title: Using Personality Inventory to Understand Self

content.question: Bella takes a test to develop an inventory of different aspects of her personality. She hopes to better understand herself and the kind of person she is. The test is most in line with which of the following theories?

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
